content.raw:
`/subt/finish` is automatically called at the end of the run.  If you do not want to accidentally end the run early, don't call `/subt/finish` at all (this will terminate in a hour of simulation time then) or call `/subt/finish` whenever you would like to terminate the run early.

This issue is likely not a Blocker in the sense you can avoid calling `/subt/finish` altogether.  Having a consensus from the robots with regard to `/subt/finish` before terminating the CloudSim run might be a good feature for Cave Circuit.
